findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose a party to liability without recourse, increasing financial risk.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The lack of audit rights limits the ability to verify compliance with the NDA, which may lead to undiscovered breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: A fixed term of three years may be insufficient for ongoing relationships, risking exposure to confidential information after expiration.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.
